name: Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Vanilla Duo, Vanilla Orchid, Marine Ozonic Accord.Fragrance Description:Gucciu2019s first floral-gourmand fragrance, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum for women is a vanilla loveru2019s dream. It blends an enchanting contrast of sweet, warm vanilla balanced with marine ozonic accord, which adds an unexpected freshness to the vanilla to create an intoxicating scent. The result is a sensual and long-lasting fragrance thatu2019s creamy, uplifting, and perfect for any occasion..About the Bottle:The Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is housed inside a yellow glass bottle and crowned with a luminous gold cap. Reimagined with the iconic Gucci Flora print both on the bottle and outer packing, the design is bursting with illustrated floral life..About the Fragrance:A signature scent for all occasions, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid invites you to weave your dreams into reality.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Cinnamal, Isoeugenol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

Smells amazing. Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on this perfume. Has an orange undertone and lasts very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping this would smell more on the vanilla side, and it doesn't smell like vanilla. This is a good smelling perfume, but it's just a perfume type of scent if that makes any sense. This smells like perfume it doesn't hit any notes I can detect distinctly. If you just need a good smelling day to day, maybe even evening perfume, this could be nice. I personally like smelling notes in my perfume. I can't detect as to what it is or smells like. I'm going to have to stop reading reviews they always are paid reviews anymore, telling you lies on everything now just so someone can get a freebe. I read the reviews on how this smells just so vanilla and sweet. I would say there is something lightly sweet in this but not vanilla. If you're like me and love most vanilla based perfumes and body mist, this will not be for you. If you're a millennial and remember Tommy girl perfume, i wore that nonstop this is kinda that type of perfume i don't mean they smell the same i mean it's like a perfume type of scent you don't know what it smells like it just smells good. Anyways, it is not bad by any means it's just not my scent profile.
Good morning this item was absolutely empty I was unable to use it all. I came to Florida and no Iu2019m back home in Maryland I need some type of accommodation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is a captivating fragrance that beautifully intertwines the creamy richness of duo vanilla with a soft floral heart. From the first spritz, the top notes of duo vanilla envelop you in a warm, inviting embrace, creating an instantly comforting experience that draws you in.  As the scent evolves, the heart reveals the enchanting Vanilla Orchid, adding a layer of sophistication to the sweetness. This floral note introduces a velvety soft texture that enhances the warmth of the vanilla, resulting in a lush, harmonious blend that feels both luxurious and approachable without overpowering the vanilla but is rather an undertone to it.   The base ozonic notes bring a refreshing contrast, providing a light and airy quality that balances the semi-sweetness of the vanilla and the floral of the orchid. This unique combination creates an intriguing depth, making the fragrance feel vibrant and dynamic.  One of the standout features of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is its longevity. This scent has a slow burn, gradually unfolding over time, which means it lingers beautifully on the skin throughout the day. You'll find that it evolves, revealing its complexities in a way that keeps you enchanted long after the initial application.  Versatile enough for both daytime wear and evening occasions, this fragrance is perfect for those who appreciate a sweet yet sophisticated scent that can transition seamlessly. Its moderate sillage leaves a delightful trail, ensuring you make a lasting impression without being overwhelming.  In a world of fleeting fragrances, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid is here to stay and offers a sweet, enduring experience that invites you to indulge in its floral warmth. If youu2019re seeking a scent that balances sweetness with elegance and lasts beautifully, look no further. Embrace the enchanting allure of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid and let your essence bloom!

The Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum was a gift from Influenster in exchange of my honest review, and to be honest this Gucci perfume has become my favorite of all times! Itu2019s smells sweet but not that strong, and its scent lasts a long time! Iu2019m simply obsess with it and wear it almost every day! People around me always ask what it is and I couldnu2019t be happier! I highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_title: If you don't like florals, give this one a shot!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I have been a strict gourmand-only girlie. Not a single floral scent has ever made it into my favorites; in fact, most of the time I feel they make me smell like an old woman. But this, this is something different! It is obviously floral, but it's also got those sweet and intoxicating notes you see in vanilla perfumes, while also not being strictly vanilla. This feels especially good for colder weather months, which brings out the warmth, but I can see it not being overpowering in the summer. I received a sample of this but I definitely plan on buying a full sized bottle when I can. If you're like me and are hesitant to try out floral perfumes, this seems like a great balance between floral and gourmand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO. GOOD. got a sample and then bought the whole thing.

reviews.review_title: Delicious perfume, the aroma has excellent duratio
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really excited about this perfume, the aroma is delicious you will captivate glances and comments about the delicious floral aroma but it also has a fusion of sweet and citrus notes. You will have this aroma for many hours, a few drops in key points and you will be fascinated with this product. I would not hesitate to buy it again, it is also an excellent gift for people that you love with your heart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own close to 400 bottles of perfumes, and this one has become my signature scent! It is feminine, elegant, playful, bright, and just all-around gentle, like a Chantilly creme. A couple of sprays are all you need to be enveloped in the most beautiful cocoon of joy! It is a milky floral scent, not sweet at all, not serious or offensive. It lasts around 8 hours on me and has amazing sillage.  Will continue to enjoy for years to come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid expecting something delicate and feminine, and it truly exceeded my expectations. The fragrance opens with vibrant floral notes, with orchid being the star, yet itu2019s not overwhelming. Itu2019s sophisticated while still feeling light, making it perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. The longevity on my skin was great, lasting for hours without being overpowering.  The bottle is also beautiful and elegant, a lovely addition to my vanity. If youu2019re a fan of floral fragrances that are both elegant and feminine, I highly recommend this one!L

reviews.review_title: Delicate and Enchanting, Perfect for Everyday Use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid! The perfume has a sophisticated yet soft floral fragrance, perfect for daily wear as well as special occasions. The notes of orchid and fresh flowers are delicate, captivating, and leave a light, charming trail on the skin. The longevity is excellent, lasting all day without being overpowering. Besides the wonderful scent, the packaging is stunning, with floral details that make you feel connected to nature. Definitely one of the best perfume .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First whiff? Boomu2014Vanilla! ud83cudf66 The top note is a strong, sweet hit of vanilla. If you're a fan of it, then this is going to be right up your alley.  The middle note: Vanilla Orchid. And Iu2019ll be real with youu2014I'm honestly not 100% sure what an orchid is supposed to smell like either. Raise your hand if you're also on team u201corchid smells like...a flower, probably?u201d (feeling validated over here!). But in this scent? Still, super vanilla-y with the most delicate whisper of floral notes. Is it floral? Yes, kinda. Is it vanilla? Absolutely. If youu2019re looking for a fragrance that screams u2018I love vanilla but I also occasionally step into a greenhouse,u2019 Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid has your back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is absolutely delicious! If youu2019re looking for a signature scent that is captivating and lingers, try the Gucci Floral Gorgeous Orchid. When I sprayed my fragrance, I found myself getting wafts of a warm vanilla-y type floral scent! This fragrance fills the air but does not overpower the room! It has notes of Vanilla, Orchid, and an Ozonic Composition. The bottle is very pretty too, a bright golden yellow bottle (similar to the other Gucci Garden fragrances) with its signature Gucci floral pattern decorating the label. This is the perfect scent for the fall! I did receive this fragrance with compliments for an honest review from Influenster! I will definitely be buying this once I finish the bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful floral scent, but not too powerful. It's a light scent that can be worn for casual every day wear, however I don't find it to be long lasting. Reapplication at least a few times is necessary.

reviews.review_title: Will definitely buy the Full Size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the travel size to see how it wore on me and fell in love! Will definitely be buying the full size when this one runs out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very pretty! Strong floral notes. And the scent lasts so little goes a long way. Iu2019m not too into the packaging design. It kind of looks like it would be a bottle of lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume and have got so many complements and Iu2019m usually not a fan of floral perfumes. I feel like it smells great and the scent is perfect for so many different people. It is a little strong so a small amount goes a long way. The packaging was great and I love the bottle design. Even when I spray a small amount Iu2019ve been told I can be smelled from across the room and the scent lasts all day and barely fades.

reviews.review_title: Great take on a Vanilla Scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone who personally doesnu2019t care for vanilla scented perfumes compared to other females I enjoyed this one. The vanilla scent is balanced nicely with the ozonic accord freshness. Doesnu2019t smell too sweet vanilla which I enjoy. If youu2019re a vanilla scent lover though this might not satisfy you enough. Might be best to stick with the Ariana Grande Cloud perfume which is also a warm scent and comes off way more smelling like sweet vanilla. Overall, for me though, I enjoyed the scent of this perfume and would wear it out just due to its unique take on a vanilla scent. Plus, it doesnu2019t hurt that that packaging of the bottle just glows with that lovely shade of yellow. Would look beautiful on any perfume shelf.

reviews.review_title: Rich at first, not so much later
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice rich floral scent. But it seems to wear off fast even though at first itu2019s overpowering strong, it turns heads and I got complimented on it multiple times.
Purchased the small size to try it. It's good but not the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a great fragrance for any women for spring/summer that wants a floral scent. This perfume will last for several hours but smell will be subtle not overbearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this scent! Upon first smell, I did not get any gourmand, but after it dried down a little, I definitely got the gourmand, which I love. Overall, I definitely would recommend for the fall/winter! I did receive this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a big fan of the other Gucci floral perfumes but I love this one. The vanilla notes pair perfectly with the floral. The longevity is great as well. This might be one of my new favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface this by saying Iu2019m VERY picky about scents. Itu2019s more often that I dislike a fragrance. But o have enjoyed several Gucci fragrances in the floral line, so I was hopeful for this one. Unfortunately, I really didnu2019t like it. It is cloyingly sweet and juvenile smelling. If you enjoy this fragrance profile, it was as long lasting as Iu2019ve come to expect from Gucci.

Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum is a floral fragrance with a sweet, sophisticated scent. It opens with fruity notes, blends into a rich orchid heart, and finishes with a warm base of vanilla. The scent is long-lasting and elegant, ideal for those who enjoy vibrant, floral perfumes. However, its sweetness might feel a bit overpowering for some, making it more suited for special occasions than daily wear. Overall, it's a luxurious and feminine fragrance with a distinctive floral profile that leaves a lasting impression. I received a free sample in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become my favorite scent to wear. It lasts a couple of hours, it has a soft vanilla scent I love. I did accidentally drop it and thankfully it did not break!

reviews.review_title: Floral Vanilla Scent in a Beautiful Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster to test. This is a versatile scent that has bites of floral and vanilla. It does last long but donu2019t work with my body chemistry and preferences as I generally prefer a less floral scent.  The packaging is unique and it is a great product overall, just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not overly sweet but still girly so great versatility! I love the yellow packaging and this is my favorite scent from this line! It lasts a long time for me too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new go to perfume! I get so many compliments on this one. It is so versatile but so elegant. The bottle is adorable in my collection and itu2019s very easy to use!

reviews.review_title: A nice floral scent with a strong vanilla note
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of the Flora Gorgeous Orchid Eau de Parfum is floral and very vanilla. Iu2019ve received several compliments while wearing this. This bottle and packaging match with the pleasant yellow accompanied by the floral motif. It is a great introduction to what awaits you.  The scent starts off strong. While overt, itu2019s not overbearing; it dissipates as the day rambles on. Itu2019s a nice, sweet, floral scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A vanilla floral scent that was really welcoming and warmth. The packaging was sleek and unique, little pricey but lasting power showed well throughout the day with layering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: From all the Flora perfumes, this is the best one! If you like sweet vanilla scents, this perfume is a must!

reviews.review_title: Flirty, fun floral scent with fruity bottom notes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really never thought there was anything missing from Gucciu2019s Flora collection and then along came this beauty packaged in a perfectly-fitting, floral, yellow bottle to match the playful scent. I absolutely loved this for a daily go to! The vanilla orchid top notes are almost immediate, but at the dry down is where Iu2019m getting a fruity, citrus scent which isnu2019t overbearing either. Itu2019s an overall fun, flirty, and sexy scent for the summer going into fall. Gucci found a way to mix vanilla and floral scent with a hint of citrus - love it. I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received the perfume nicely packaged. Love the soft scent of this perfume without it being too strong. My guy really loves the smell of it as it's a soft floral scent.  It also lasts through out the day.

Gucci really created a subtle yet en captivating scent with this one. I usually donu2019t prefer floral sense but this one is clean, vibrant, and lasts all day. Will definitely add this as a go to in my collection of perfumes

reviews.review_title: Luxury, Light & Refreshing in a Beautiful Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent was soft, subtle and sexy. The packaging as well as the bottle are  eye catching, and one you donu2019t mind showing off.   The scent, while floral, I found it to be fresh, light and long lasting.   This could be a  daily scent or a nice evening out. I was complimented each time I wore it, which speaks volumes to the scent.   Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is AMAZING! My favorite scent out of all of the Floras. Its very long lasting. The scent is like cotton candy meets a garden of fresh flowers ud83dudc90 very luxurious scent! Even though its flowery and sweet, its not overwhealming or too sweet at all.  The bottle is gorgeous and feels luxurious as well.   Would def buy myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this perfume is gorgeous! I love the floral notes. It seems a bit strong of a scent to me, but Iu2019m pregnant so that could just be me being sensitive.

reviews.review_title: Nice sweet scent fr Gucci Flora
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Design 8/10: The bottle's pretty cute. It keeps the original design of the bottle Gucci flora aesthetic, classy and chic with gold cap. The bottle feels nice and weighty.  Scent 7/10: Top note opens with this light, airy sweetness going on, definitely picking up some vanilla but it's not in-your-face sweet. No harsh alcohol smell (thank goodness!). I know some folks have been getting banana Laffy Taffy vibes, but I'm not really catching that. It's more of a fruity floral to my nose at first, then the vanilla kicks in stronger later, getting all creamy and gourmand-y. Orchid in the middle note started to come out after 15 mins.    Sillage 7/10:  The sweetness actually amps up about half an hour in, which is nice    Longevity 5/10: eh, it's okay. Hangs around for a decent while, but after about 4 hours, it's basically a skin scent.  Overall 6.75/10 : Not mind-blowing or anything, but not bad either. I can see this working for younger girls, maybe early 20s. It's pretty safe/inoffensive  and can be everyday wear. Feels like a good late summer/early fall scent, or maybe early spring time. If you're into sweet scents, this can be safe blindbuy. It's not going to give you a headache or anything. Just don't expect something super unique or groundbreaking, you know? However, I feel this is the nicest Gucci Flora I have smelled. I havenu2019t been too keen on this line since none of them has impressed me but this one is a little different.

reviews.review_title: Dry down caught me off guard
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great fruity floral at first and very great for spring and summer. Without being too offensive it doesnu2019t project too much but just enough to catch a whiff as you walk past. However this scent dries down to eventually smell like old hairspray on me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This floral perfume was a bit overwhelming for me. It has a wonderful but powerful vanilla scent. I prefer clean and sweet. A little spray goes a long way. The projection is great. I wore it to work and received compliments from my coworkers. Its lasted almost a whole day for me.  I love the design itu2019s a beautiful but heavy mustered bottle. I didnu2019t like the fact it has alcohol in it. I received this from influencer for my honesty review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omgeeeeee it smells so good.By far one my favorites thus far.Its not overpowering it's light so do like that.It doesn't last all day that's one thing I don't like but I feel like if you find something to pair it with it then that may work.But overall its a beautiful scent u203cufe0f

reviews.review_title: A sweet and floral scent that lasts all day
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a great rich scent that is not overly powerful but has a combination of sweet and floral notes. The bottle is the perfect size for on the go usage and has adorable packaging. This is one of my favorite scents iu2019ve owned!! It makes me feel very confident. Itu2019s a great scent that lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the scent, itu2019s a Floralufffc scent parfum that lasts all day. The packaging is very cute and chic. This is my new signature scent. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest feedback. I enjoyed this perfume a little more than the other Gucci perfumes. I think the notes are pretty accurate. I will say that at first is was pretty strong with a slight alcohol smell but after an hour or so it settled down and started to really smell good.

reviews.review_title: Light floral scent for everyday use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to review in return for my honest review.   The bottle itself is beautiful. I love the color scheme. The floral label is eye catching. The scent is light. I did not find it overpowering. I can primarily smell the vanilla with soft floral notes. Overall, this is a great everyday perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Gorgeous Orchid scent, although it's not exactly what I originally imagined when I read that it was a vanilla gourmand scent. I chose it because although I have chemical sensitivities, gourmand scents often do not effect them. This scent has many layers: I first notice a delicate floral, then a light vanilla, and then the marine ozonic accord. It is light and beautiful and even slightly makes my mouth water, lol. It does still effect my sensitivities a little bit, but not as much as normal perfumes and it has a very refreshing, bright quality to it. It lasts a long time. Overall, I am quite satisfied with it.

reviews.review_title: I absolutely LOVE this perfume. It smells a bit on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this perfume. It smells a bit on the sweet side. I love the yellow and floral on the packaging. The shape of the bottle is not like other perfumes iu2019ve seen. Itu2019s easy to take on the go because of its shape. I think this would be VERY popular among people

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich white florals, sweetness of wild honeysuckle, and salty ozonic effervescence melded together triggering an illusion of decadent indulgence. Lemon tarts, cinnamon creme bru00fblee, a tropical cocktail on a Mediterranean coast, or little Banana candies! This fragrance creates an atmosphere that allows your imagination to roam. All while composing an alluring yet modest sillage that invites you closer. A lovely fragrance for warm weather outings, or cozy candlelit memories. Either occasion this will fit in perfectly and accompany you for about 6-8 hours with the latter 2 lingering closer to the skin. A Gorgeous pick in Orchid Eau De Parfum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a bad scent, itu2019s just too strong for me personally, suffering from migraines. The floral is overwhelming to me. If you donu2019t have that problem I think youu2019ll like this because the scent is strong and lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is gorgeous Iu2019ve been using it for a while now and the scent is really long lasting it stays on my clothes for days and itu2019s very strong

reviews.review_title: Light floral scent for everyday use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to review in return for my honest review.   The bottle itself is beautiful. I love the color scheme. The floral label is eye catching. The scent is light. I did not find it overpowering. I can primarily smell the vanilla with soft floral notes. Overall, this is a great everyday perfume.
